column4: I am completely new to Ubuntu, and have a weird question.  I just installed 8.1 on a laptop.  I have a small game program, about 3M in size.  It is a single file executable, so no installation or packages or anything (sort of like an old DOS program).  But it won't work on Ubuntu.  A friend of mine had the game, and he copied it to his home directory, and it ran.  When I do that, it still won't run.  Is there something in the setting to enable runni
ed to set permissions on it, or something else?
Oh, no, it's not a DOS game.
